entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sheet Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 12.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
